action.description: From printer.Read first time. To committee.From committee: Amend, and do pass as amended.Placed on Second Reading File.Declared an emergency measure under the Constitution.Read second time. Amended. (Amend. No. 1.)Reprinting dispensed with.Placed on General File.Read third time. Passed, as amended. Title approved, as amended. (Yeas: 21, Nays: None.) To printer.
